graph_title: Proportion of households with centralized water supply
indicator_name: Proportion of households with centralized water supply
national_indicator_description: Dividing the number of households with centralized water supply by the total number of households.
computation_definitions: Pipeline clean water supply to consumers.
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated by dividing the number of households with centralized water supply by the total number of households.
comments_limitations: The main source of information is an Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217).
source_organisation_2: Integrated Living Conditions Survey of households (ILCS)
